text.p: The board of Lithuania's National Stock exchange on Tuesday said it was suspending trade in shares of the following companies:
1. Lithuanian Gas, on 04.04.97- 14.04.97, at issuers request because of the general shareholders' meeting.
2. Kaisiadoriu Autotransportas, on 02.04.97 - up to three months - to allow the state's shares to be sold at a privatisation auction.
3. Naftos Terminalas, from 02.04.97 - up to three months, because the registeration of some of its shares has been cancelled.
4. Elfa, from 02.04.97 - up to three months, because the registeration of some of its shares has been cancelled.
5. Vilniaus Duona, 02.04.97- up to three months, because of the increase of authorised capital from reserves.
6. Auriga, 02.02.97- up to three months, because of the increase of the authorised capital from reserves.
